problem_names:
lemma \<phi>L[simp,intro]: "\<And>\<phi>. \<phi> \<in> fmla \<Longrightarrow> Fvars \<phi> = {} \<Longrightarrow> \<phi>L \<phi> \<in> fmla"
and
Fvars_\<phi>L[simp]: "\<phi> \<in> fmla \<Longrightarrow> Fvars \<phi> = {} \<Longrightarrow> Fvars (\<phi>L \<phi>) = {}"
translations:
lemma \<phi>L[simp,intro]: "\<And>\<phi>. \<phi> \<in> fmla \<Longrightarrow> Fvars \<phi> = {} \<Longrightarrow> \<phi>L \<phi> \<in> fmla"
and
Fvars_\<phi>L[simp]: "\<phi> \<in> fmla \<Longrightarrow> Fvars \<phi> = {} \<Longrightarrow> Fvars (\<phi>L \<phi>) = {}"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>\<phi>.
        \<lbrakk>\<phi> \<in> fmla; Fvars \<phi> = {}\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> \<phi>L \<phi> \<in> fmla) &&&
    (\<lbrakk>\<phi> \<in> fmla; Fvars \<phi> = {}\<rbrakk>
     \<Longrightarrow> Fvars (\<phi>L \<phi>) = {})

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>\<phi>.
        \<lbrakk>\<phi> \<in> fmla; Fvars \<phi> = {}\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> diag (imp P \<phi>) \<in> fmla) &&&
    (\<lbrakk>\<phi> \<in> fmla; Fvars \<phi> = {}\<rbrakk>
     \<Longrightarrow> Fvars (diag (imp P \<phi>)) = {})

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<phi> \<in> fmla; Fvars \<phi> = {}\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> bprv
                       (eqv (\<phi>L \<phi>)
                         (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<phi> \<in> fmla; Fvars \<phi> = {}\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> bprv
                       (eqv (diag (imp P \<phi>))
                         (imp (subst P \<langle>diag (imp P \<phi>)\<rangle>
                                xx)
                           \<phi>))

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>imp P \<phi> \<in> fmla; Fvars (imp P \<phi>) = {xx}\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> bprv
                     (eqv (diag (imp P \<phi>))
                       (subst (imp P \<phi>)
                         \<langle>diag (imp P \<phi>)\<rangle> xx))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<phi> \<in> fmla; Fvars \<phi> = {}\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> bprv
                       (eqv (diag (imp P \<phi>))
                         (imp (subst P \<langle>diag (imp P \<phi>)\<rangle>
                                xx)
                           \<phi>))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<phi> \<in> fmla; Fvars \<phi> = {}\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> prv (eqv (\<phi>L \<phi>)
                            (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
                              \<phi>))

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>eqv (\<phi>L ?\<phi>1)
            (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L ?\<phi>1\<rangle>) ?\<phi>1)
           \<in> fmla;
   Fvars
    (eqv (\<phi>L ?\<phi>1)
      (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L ?\<phi>1\<rangle>) ?\<phi>1)) =
   {};
   ?\<phi>1 \<in> fmla; Fvars ?\<phi>1 = {}\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> prv (eqv (\<phi>L ?\<phi>1)
                          (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L ?\<phi>1\<rangle>)
                            ?\<phi>1))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<phi> \<in> fmla; Fvars \<phi> = {}\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> prv (eqv (\<phi>L \<phi>)
                            (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
                              \<phi>))
